item.description:
Hello, Java Meetup members!
Lets gather and talk Java - Java programming, Java IDE's, Java frameworks, Java future, Java's competition, Java projects, Java successes, Java failures, Java tools, ...

Our meetings are personal, engaging and everybody is sharing in the topic at hand. Come and share your experience with us. Spring is here, making it easier to come to the venue and enjoy the company of Java enthusiasts.

Kaj
P.S.: Thank you to the many members that RSVP (one way or another). This helps me to manage the crowd at the venue.
item.name: The Boston Java October Meetup
